title: Hey can someone help me please? :D
body: I just got perma banned but i only defended myself i barely even swore i think they must have accidently done it because if you read the chat i didn't deserve it but i don't know how to appeal can someone help me please? thanks

replies.body: If you're unsure of what you said that might have triggered a punishment you can post your chat logs here and we can take a look. Otherwise if you want to go straight to appeal you can do so here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
